うず: (うず) - will probably be; intending to/will; should

うず高い: (うずたかい) - piled up high; in a heap
うず高く: (うずたかく) - piled up high; in a heap
うそうそ: (usouso) - inquietamente, de forma agitada, de maneira errática

うた沢: (うたざわ) - (歌沢 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen) slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
うた沢節: (うたざわぶし) - (歌沢節 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢節 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen)  slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
うだうだ: (うだうだ) - idle; long-winded and meaningless
うだつが上がらない: (うだつがあがらない) - no hope of getting ahead
うだつの上がらない: (うだつのあがらない) - lacking potential for advancement; no-hoper

うちなーすば: (うちなあすば) - Okinawa soba (thick noodles served in a pork soup)
うちの人: (うちのひと) - my husband; one's family
うちの者: (うちのもの) - a member of one's "in group" (e.g. one's family, employees, etc.)

うち続く: (うちつづく) - to continue for a long time; to undergo a repeated series

うち連れる: (うちつれる) - to go along with
